00012 /**
00013 * @brief Function for setting the Eigen lib object values to the elements of the matrix.
00014 */
00015 void Matrix3x3::toEigen()
00016 {
00017         (*matrix3d)(0)=xx;
00018         (*matrix3d)(1)=xy;
00019         (*matrix3d)(2)=xz;
00020         (*matrix3d)(3)=yx;
00021         (*matrix3d)(4)=yy;
00022         (*matrix3d)(5)=yz;
00023         (*matrix3d)(6)=zx;
00024         (*matrix3d)(7)=zy;
00025         (*matrix3d)(8)=zz;
00026 };
00027 
00028 /**
00029 * @brief Function for setting the elements of the matrix to the Eigen lib object values. 
00030 */
00031 void Matrix3x3::fromEigen()
00032 {
00033         xx=(*matrix3d)(0);
00034         xy=(*matrix3d)(1);
00035         xz=(*matrix3d)(2);
00036         yx=(*matrix3d)(3);
00037         yy=(*matrix3d)(4);
00038         yz=(*matrix3d)(5);
00039         zx=(*matrix3d)(6);
00040         zy=(*matrix3d)(7);
00041         zz=(*matrix3d)(8);
00042 };
00043 
00044 /**
00045 * @brief Function for setting the Eigen lib object values to the elements of the quaternion.
00046 */
00047 void SpinachGUI::Quaternion::toEigen()
00048 {
00049         quaterniond->x()=x;
00050         quaterniond->y()=y;
00051         quaterniond->z()=z;
00052         quaterniond->w()=w;
00053 };
00054 
00055 /**
00056 * @brief Function for setting the elements of the quaternion to the Eigen lib object values. 
00057 */
00058 void SpinachGUI::Quaternion::fromEigen()
00059 {
00060         x=quaterniond->x();
00061         y=quaterniond->y();
00062         z=quaterniond->z();
00063         w=quaterniond->w();
00064 };
00065 
00066 /**
00067 * @brief Function for setting the Eigen lib object values to the elements of the Angle axis.
00068 */
00069 void SpinachGUI::AngleAxis::toEigen()
00070 {
00071         angleaxisd->axis().x()=x;
00072         angleaxisd->axis().y()=y;
00073         angleaxisd->axis().z()=z;
00074         angleaxisd->angle()=angle;
00075 };
00076 
00077 /**
00078 * @brief Function for setting the elements of the Angle axis to the Eigen lib object values.
00079 */
00080 void SpinachGUI::AngleAxis::fromEigen()
00081 {
00082         x=angleaxisd->axis().x();
00083         y=angleaxisd->axis().y();
00084         z=angleaxisd->axis().z();
00085         angle=angleaxisd->angle();
00086 };

00088 /**
00089 * @brief Getter of normalized quaternion object.
00090 * @result Returns normalized quaternion object.
00091 */
00092 SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ SpinachGUI::Quaternion::Normalized() 
00093 {
00094         //Pass to the Eigen library object
00095         this->toEigen();
00096 
00097         //Normalize
00098         quaterniond->normalize();
00099 
00100         //Take it from Eigen library object and return
00101         this->fromEigen();
00102         return this;
00103 }
00104 
00105 /**
00106 * @brief Getter of normalized AngleAxis object.
00107 * @result Returns normalized AngleAxis object.
00108 */
00109 SpinachGUI::AngleAxis^ SpinachGUI::AngleAxis::Normalized()
00110 {
00111         //Pass to the Eigen library object
00112         this->toEigen();
00113 
00114         //Normalize
00115         angleaxisd->axis().normalize();
00116 
00117         //Take it from Eigen library object and return
00118         this->fromEigen();
00119         return this;
00120 }

00126 /**
00127 * @brief Function for giving the normalized orientation.
00128 * @result Returns a new orientation which is the normalized current orrientation.
00129 */
00130 Orientation^ Orientation::Normalized()  
00131 {
00132 
00133         //Check what type of orientation and then create a new one which is normalized
00134         if(mType == EULER)      return gcnew Orientation(mEuler);
00135         if(mType == DCM)        return gcnew Orientation(myMatrix);
00136         if(mType == QUATERNION) return gcnew Orientation(myQuaternion->Normalized());   
00137         if(mType == ANGLE_AXIS) return gcnew Orientation(myAngleAxis->Normalized());
00138 
00139         //In case of unknown type, shows message and returns a new empty quaternion orientation
00140         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show("Orientation with Unknown Type, returning Quaternion Orientation",
00141                 "Error",  System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK, 
00142                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00143         return gcnew Orientation();
00144 }

00147 /**
00148 * @brief Function for checking if elements are zero.
00149 */
00150 void Orientation::Invariant() 
00151 {
00152         //In case of unknown type, Shows message
00153         if(!(mType == ANGLE_AXIS || mType == DCM || mType == QUATERNION || mType == EULER)) 
00154         {
00155                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show("mType set to invalid value.",
00156                         "Error",  System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK, 
00157                         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00158         };
00159 
00160         if(mType == ANGLE_AXIS) 
00161         {
00162                 //Pass to Eigen lib object and set a new vector form the axis
00163                 myAngleAxis->toEigen();
00164                 Eigen::Vector3d axis = myAngleAxis->angleaxisd->axis();
00165 
00166                 //Check if the axis is zero give message
00167                 if(axis.x() == 0 && axis.y() == 0 && axis.z() == 0) 
00168                 {
00169                         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show(
00170                                 "An orientation in angle-axis notation has (0,0,0) as it's axis vector",
00171                                 "Error",  System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK, 
00172                                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00173                 };
00174         } 
00175         else if(mType == QUATERNION) 
00176         {
00177                 //Pass to Eigen lib object
00178                 myQuaternion->toEigen();
00179 
00180                 //Check if parameters are zero give message
00181                 if(myQuaternion->quaterniond->x() == 0 && myQuaternion->quaterniond->y() == 0 && 
00182                         myQuaternion->quaterniond->z() == 0 && myQuaternion->quaterniond->w() == 0)
00183                 {
00184                         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show(
00185                                 "An orientation in quaternion notation is (0,0,0,0)",
00186                                 "Error",  System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK, 
00187                                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00188                 };
00189         };
00190 }

00193 /**
00194 * @brief Function for returning orientation as Euler angles.
00195 * @result Returns orientation object to Euler angles object.
00196 */
00197 SpinachGUI::EulerAngles^ Orientation::GetAsEuler() 
00198 {
00199         //Set new orientation as the current one normalized
00200         Orientation^ normalized=this->Normalized();
00201 
00202         //Depending type, convert the normalized orientation to Euler angles form
00203         if(mType == EULER) return ConvertToEuler(normalized->mEuler);                           
00204         if(mType == DCM)   return ConvertToEuler(normalized->myMatrix);                         
00205         if(mType == ANGLE_AXIS) return ConvertToEuler(normalized->myAngleAxis);         
00206         if(mType == QUATERNION) return ConvertToEuler(normalized->myQuaternion);
00207 
00208         //In case of unknown type, shows message and returns a new empty euler angles orientation
00209         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show("Requesting Unknown Orientation Type",
00210                 "Error",  System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK, 
00211                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00212         return gcnew EulerAngles();
00213 }

00216 /**
00217 * @brief Function for returning orientation as DCM matrix.
00218 * @result Returns orientation object to DCM matrix object.
00219 */
00220 SpinachGUI::Matrix3x3^ Orientation::GetAsDCM() 
00221 {
00222         //Set new orientation as the current one normalized
00223         Orientation^ normalized=Normalized();
00224 
00225         //Depending type, convert the normalized orientation to DCM matrix form
00226         if(mType == EULER) return ConvertToDCM(normalized->mEuler);                             
00227         if(mType == DCM)   return ConvertToDCM(normalized->myMatrix);                           
00228         if(mType == ANGLE_AXIS) return ConvertToDCM(normalized->myAngleAxis);           
00229         if(mType == QUATERNION)  return ConvertToDCM(normalized->myQuaternion);
00230 
00231         //In case of unknown type, returns a new empty DCM matrix orientation
00232         return gcnew Matrix3x3();
00233 }

00240 SpinachGUI::AngleAxis^ Orientation::GetAsAngleAxis() 
00241 {
00242         //Set new orientation as the current one normalized
00243         Orientation^ normalized=Normalized();
00244 
00245         //Depending type, convert the normalized orientation to angle axis form
00246         if(mType == EULER) return ConvertToAngleAxis(normalized->mEuler);                               
00247         if(mType == DCM)   return ConvertToAngleAxis(normalized->myMatrix);                             
00248         if(mType == ANGLE_AXIS) return ConvertToAngleAxis(normalized->myAngleAxis);             
00249         if(mType == QUATERNION) return ConvertToAngleAxis(normalized->myQuaternion);

00260 /**
00261 * @brief Function for returning orientation as quaternion.
00262 * @result Returns orientation object to quaternion object.
00263 */
00264 SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ Orientation::GetAsQuaternion() 
00265 {
00266         //Set new orientation as the current one normalized
00267         Orientation^ normalized=Normalized();
00268 
00269         //Depending type, convert the normalized orientation to quaternion form
00270         if(mType == EULER) return ConvertToQuaternion(normalized->mEuler);                              
00271         if(mType == DCM)   return ConvertToQuaternion(normalized->myMatrix);                            
00272         if(mType == ANGLE_AXIS) return ConvertToQuaternion(normalized->myAngleAxis);            
00273         if(mType == QUATERNION) return ConvertToQuaternion(normalized->myQuaternion);
00274 
00275         //In case of unknown type, shows message and returns a new empty quaternion orientation
00276         System::Windows::Forms::MessageBox::Show("Requesting Unknown Orientation Type",
00277                 "Error",  System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxButtons::OK, 
00278                 System::Windows::Forms::MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00279         return gcnew SpinachGUI::Quaternion();
00280 }

00284 #pragma region "Orientation Convertion functions"
00285 
00286 /**
00287 * @brief Convertion function from  Quaternion to Euler angles  object.
00288 * @param rot Quaternion object.
00289 * @result Returns the converted to Euler angles object.
00290 */
00291 SpinachGUI::EulerAngles^ Orientation::ConvertToEuler(SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ rot) 
00292 {
00293         double PI=3.141592653589793238462643;
00294         Vector3d z_axis=Vector3d(0,0,1);
00295         Vector3d x_axis=Vector3d(1,0,0);
00296 
00297         //Pass to Eigen lib object
00298         rot->toEigen();
00299 
00300         //Set z,x axis form the quaternion
00301         z_axis=*(rot->quaterniond)*z_axis;
00302         x_axis=*(rot->quaterniond)*x_axis;
00303 
00304         //Find the gamma from the angle of z_axis
00305         double gamma=atan2(z_axis.y(),z_axis.x());
00306 
00307         //Find beta from the angle of z_axis using the length 
00308         double beta=atan2(sqrt(z_axis.x()*z_axis.x() + z_axis.y()*z_axis.y()),z_axis.z());
00309 
00310         //Use γ and β to rotate V2 back onto the point 0,0,1
00311         Quaterniond betaTwist(AngleAxisd(-beta, Vector3d(0,1,0)));
00312         Quaterniond gammaTwist (AngleAxisd(-gamma,Vector3d(0,0,1)));
00313 
00314         //Calculate x axis form the twists
00315         x_axis=(betaTwist*gammaTwist)*x_axis;
00316 
00317         //Find alpha from the angle of x_axis
00318         double alpha = atan2(x_axis.y(),x_axis.x());
00319 
00320         //Convention for alpha angle:Transcate to first quarter
00321         if(alpha < 0 || alpha >= 2*PI)  alpha = alpha-2*PI*floor(alpha/(2*PI));
00322         if(alpha >= 2*PI) alpha = 0;
00323 
00324         //Convention for beta angle:Transcate to first two quarters
00325         if(beta < 0 || beta >= PI)    beta = beta-  PI*floor(beta/PI);
00326 
00327         //Convention for gamma angle:Transcate to first quarter
00328         if(gamma < 0 || gamma >= 2*PI)  gamma = gamma-2*PI*floor(gamma/(2*PI));
00329         if(gamma >= 2*PI) gamma = 0;
00330 
00331         return gcnew EulerAngles(gamma,beta,alpha);
00332 }
00333 
00334 /**
00335 * @brief Convertion function from  Euler angles to Quaternion object.
00336 * @param rot Euler angles object.
00337 * @result Returns the converted to Quaternion object.
00338 */
00339 SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ Orientation::ConvertToQuaternion(EulerAngles^ rot) 
00340 {
00341         //Set three new quaternion using each angle axis in the x,y,z axes respectively
00342         Quaterniond q1(AngleAxisd(rot->alpha,Vector3d(0,0,1)));
00343         Quaterniond q2(AngleAxisd(rot->beta, Vector3d(0,1,0)));
00344         Quaterniond q3(AngleAxisd(rot->gamma,Vector3d(0,0,1)));
00345 
00346         //Create a new empty quaternion object
00347         Quaternion^ result=gcnew Quaternion();
00348 
00349         //Set Eigen lib object using the Eigen quaternion form  multipling the three previous quaternions
00350         *(result->quaterniond)=q3*q2*q1;
00351 
00352         //Pass to quaternion form from eigen lib and return
00353         result->fromEigen();
00354         return result;
00355 }
00356 
00357 /**
00358 * @brief Convertion function from  Quaternion to DCM matrix  object.
00359 * @param rot Quaternion object.
00360 * @result Returns the converted to DCM matrix object.
00361 */
00362 SpinachGUI::Matrix3x3^  Orientation::ConvertToDCM(SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ rot)
00363 {
00364         //Pass to Eigen lib object
00365         rot->toEigen();
00366 
00367         //Create a new empty DCM matrix object
00368         Matrix3x3^ result=gcnew Matrix3x3();
00369 
00370         //Set Eigen lib object using the Eigen quaternion form of rot
00371         *result->matrix3d=rot->quaterniond->toRotationMatrix();
00372 
00373         //Pass to DCM matrix form from eigen lib and return
00374         result->fromEigen(); 
00375         return result;
00376 };
00377 
00378 /**
00379 * @brief Convertion function from  DCM matrix to Quaternion  object.
00380 * @param rot DCM matrix object.
00381 * @result Returns the converted to Quaternion object.
00382 */
00383 SpinachGUI::Quaternion^  Orientation::ConvertToQuaternion(SpinachGUI::Matrix3x3^    rot)
00384 {
00385         //Pass to Eigen lib object
00386         rot->toEigen();
00387 
00388         //Create a new empty quaternion object
00389         SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ result=gcnew SpinachGUI::Quaternion();
00390 
00391         //Set Eigen lib object using the Eigen matrix3d form of rot
00392         result->quaterniond=new Quaterniond(*rot->matrix3d);
00393 
00394         //Pass to quaternion form from eigen lib and return
00395         result->fromEigen(); 
00396         return result;
00397 };

00399 /**
00400 * @brief Convertion function from  AngleAxis to Quaternion  object.
00401 * @param rot AngleAxis object.
00402 * @result Returns the converted to Quaternion object.
00403 */
00404 SpinachGUI::Quaternion^  Orientation::ConvertToQuaternion(SpinachGUI::AngleAxis^   rot)
00405 {
00406         //Pass to Eigen lib object
00407         rot->toEigen();
00408 
00409         //Create a new empty quaternion object
00410         SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ result=gcnew SpinachGUI::Quaternion();
00411 
00412         //Set Eigen lib object using the Eigen angleaxis form of rot
00413         result->quaterniond=new Quaterniond(*rot->angleaxisd);
00414 
00415         //Pass to quaternion form from eigen lib and return
00416         result->fromEigen(); 
00417         return result;
00418 };

00420 /**
00421 * @brief Convertion function from Quaternion to AngleAxis object.
00422 * @param rot Quaternion object.
00423 * @result Returns the converted to AngleAxis object.
00424 */
00425 SpinachGUI::AngleAxis^ Orientation::ConvertToAngleAxis(SpinachGUI::Quaternion^ rot)
00426 {
00427         //Pass to Eigen lib object
00428         rot->toEigen();
00429 
00430         //Create a new empty Angle axis object
00431         SpinachGUI::AngleAxis^ result=gcnew SpinachGUI::AngleAxis();
00432 
00433         //Set Eigen lib object using the Eigen quaternion form of rot
00434         result->angleaxisd=new AngleAxisd(*rot->quaterniond);
00435 
00436         //Pass to angleaxis form from eigen lib and return
00437         result->fromEigen(); 
00438         return result;  
00439 };
